choices.label: The figure presents a graph of a curve in a coordinate plane. The horizontal axis is labeled x, the vertical axis is labeled K and the origin O. About halfway along the horizontal axis and a third of the way up the vertical axis, the curve moves steeply upward and to the right ending nearly vertical.
